sqlMap.select: select component_code code, component_description description from system_table_two where group_code in ('CENCDD','CENCOD') and component_code != '--' order by component_description asc;
select first_name from applicant_account_info where user_name = #applicationNumber# and password = sha1(#password#);
sqlMap.update: update applicant_program_registration as apr join student_registration as sr on sr.registration_number = apr.registration_number and apr.program_id = sr.program_id set sr.exam_center1 = #examCenterCode#, sr.modification_time = now() where apr.application_number = #applicationNumber#;
sqlMap.select: select ec.component_description from applicant_program_registration as apr join student_registration as sr on sr.registration_number = apr.registration_number and apr.program_id = sr.program_id join system_table_two as ec on ec.component_code = sr.exam_center1 and ec.group_code in ('CENCDD','CENCOD') where apr.application_number = #applicationNumber#;
